titles: The praise of London, or, A delicate new ditty which doth invite you to faire London cit[y] I cannot rightly speake but in her praise, because shee is the flower of earthly ioyes : to the tune of  the second part of Hide Parke / [by] R.C.
author: Crimsal, Richard.
notes: Date of publication from STC (2nd ed.).
Right half of sheet contains: The second part, to the same tune.
Imperfect: tightly bound with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Pepys Library.
